a.title: Permanent Link to Superintendent Update – April 17

div.p: School closures extended until May 15, 2020. Be well and stay safe.

a.title: Permanent Link to BOE seeks student representative for 2020-2021 school year

h3.a: BOE seeks student representative for 2020-2021 school year

div.p: Interested members of the MWHS Class of 2021 are asked to complete online form and email resume by Monday, May 1, 2020.

a.title: Permanent Link to Little Miracles Preschool registration open for 2020-21 school year

h3.a: Little Miracles Preschool registration open for 2020-21 school year

div.p: Program is open to all four year olds in the school district. Please complete the registration form found on the website by May 29, 2020.
